title: New Health Conditions may be Added to Medical Marijuana Eligibility List (Aurora Regional Chamber of ...
text: ( Source : Aurora Regional Chamber of Commerce ) Under current law, a patient is only eligible for a medical cannabis card if he or she has been diagnosed with any one of 39 specified medical conditions. Many patients who do not have any of
